name: Default Checked Link
author: eballo

sections.description:
The default link functionality is to open on the same browser page. If you want the link to be opened in a new page, you need to create the link and then enable the check box. This can be quite annoying when you always want the link to open in a new window.

This plugin enables the check box to be ticked by default so that a link always opens in a new window every time you insert/edit link.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/default-new-window-link-opener directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First version – Enable by default the checkbox in a new window.

1.1

  • Update text description.
  • Add Security check.

1.2

  • Update screenshot
  • update description
